original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ pasannacittaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
analyzed: ▁idh ā haṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁ekacc aṃ ▁puggal aṃ ▁pasann acitt aṃ ▁evaṃ ▁cetasā ▁cet o ▁pari cca ▁pajān āmi

original: ‘imamhi cāyaṁ samaye puggalo kālaṁ kareyya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge’.
analyzed: ▁im amhi ▁cā yaṃ ▁samaye ▁puggalo ▁kālaṃ ▁kareyya ▁yathā bha taṃ ▁nikkhitt o ▁evaṃ ▁sagg e

original: Cetopasādahetu kho pana, bhikkhave, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī”ti.
analyzed: ▁cet o pasād ahetu ▁kho ▁pana ▁bhikkhave ▁evam i dh eka cc e ▁sattā ▁kāyassa ▁bhed ā ▁paraṃ ▁maraṇā ▁sugat iṃ ▁sagg aṃ ▁lok aṃ ▁upapajj antīti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
